meanings: 실용회화-사내에서 Am I? I guess I am.
whether someone does something or not

vlive.korean: 그러네! You are right! 듣기 View video NCT : 19
그러네? - 그렇죠? That's right. - Right? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
잘 나왔는데, 사나? - 그러네? 원스 이거 내가 가져도 돼요? You too, SANA. - Right. ONCE, can I take these? 듣기 View video Dispatch : 트와이스 ‘디아이콘’ 언박싱🐰🐹🦅
vlive.english: You too, SANA. - Right. ONCE, can I take these?

vlive.korean: "황당무계한 공상을 잘한다" 내가 이거 때문에 그러네! "You daydream about unrealistic things". This is why! 듣기 View video KIM WOO SEOK : 오늘, 우석이와 함께해요
vlive.english: "You daydream about unrealistic things". This is why!

vlive.korean: [장구치고] 그러네? [Each other] Yeah. 듣기 View video 내 전공은 힙합(My major is HIPHOP) : Ep 21. 각성해서 나타난 성균관대 꾼!! 서울대 츄플의 위기??!!

examples.korean: Yes, go ahead and open a window. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러네요, 가서 창문을 여시지요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes, go ahead and open a window. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Oh, you're right. I got busy and forgot all about the time. I'll finish up here and we can go. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 아, 그러네요. 바빠서 시간 가는 줄도 몰랐어요. 하던 일만 끝내고 가죠. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Oh, you're right. I got busy and forgot all about the time. I'll finish up here and we can go. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: Yes, but I've spotted an error: there are two talks scheduled in the same room at the same time. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러네요, 근데 잘못된 걸 하나 발견했어요. 같은 시간에 같은 방에서 강연이 두 개가 예정되어있네요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Yes, but I've spotted an error: there are two talks scheduled in the same room at the same time. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The kids next door are at it again. I'm going to complain. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 옆집 애들이 또 그러네요. 뭐라고 해야 겠어요. Neungyule
examples.english: The kids next door are at it again. I'm going to complain. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: I'll say. I'm glad I always keep an umbrella in my office. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그러네요. 난 사무실에다 항상 우산을 두고 다녀서 걱정 없어요. YBM All in All English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I'll say. I'm glad I always keep an umbrella in my office. Add to Wordbook
